text: The Looney Tunes Show is an American animated sitcom. It was produced by Warner Bros. Animation. The program ran from May 3, 2011 through November 2, 2013, on Cartoon Network. The show has 2 seasons. Each season had 26 episodes. The program featured characters from the Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies cartoon shorts updated for the 21st century. ==Notes== ==References== Category:English-language television programs Category:Looney Tunes Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:2010s American animated television series Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:2013 American television series endings
title: The Looney Tunes Show
